frame.name: Fluidic_motion
frame.definition: <def-root>In this frame a <fen>Fluid</fen> moves from a <fen>Source</fen> to a <fen>Goal</fen> along a <fen>Path</fen> or within an <fen>Area</fen>. <ex> <fex name="Fluid">The blood</fex> <t>spurted</t> <fex name="Source">from the wound</fex>. </ex><ex><fex name="Fluid">The water</fex> <t>gushed</t> <fex name="Goal">into the house</fex> . </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Area
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Area</fen> is the setting in which the <fen>Fluid</fen>'s movement takes place on an unspecified <fen>Path</fen>. <ex>The Thames River <t>flows</t> <fex name="Area">throughout England</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Distance
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE describes the phsyical extent of the motion of the <fen>Fluid</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition: <def-root>The amount of time for which the <fen>Fluid</fen> moves.</def-root>

FE.name: Goal
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Goal</fen> is the location the <fen>Fluid</fen> ends up.</def-root>

FE.name: Path
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Path</fen> is the trajectory along which the <fen>Fluid</fen> moves.</def-root>

FE.name: Source
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Source</fen> is the location the <fen>Fluid</fen> occupies initially.</def-root>

FE.name: Speed
FE.definition: <def-root>This is the rate at which the <fen>Fluid</fen> flows.</def-root>

FE.name: Fluid
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Fluid</fen> is the entity that changes location and moves in a fluidic way.</def-root>

FE.name: Configuration
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Configuration</fen> encodes information about the amount, arrangement, and unitization of the flow. <ex><fex name="Fluid">The water</fex> <t>cascaded</t> <fex name="Configuration">in torrents</fex></ex> . <ex><fex name="Fluid">The water</fex> <t>cascades</t> <fex name="Configuration">in large volumes</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Explanation</fen> is the reason for the fluidic motion. <ex>It <t>flowed</t> <fex name="Explanation">from the sheer weight of water above it</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Depictive
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Depictive</fen> phrase describing the <fen>Fluid</fen> throughout the action. </def-root>

FE.name: Result
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the result of the <fen>Fluid</fen> moving.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The Place describes the location of the motion which has a specified Source, Path or Goal. <ex><fex name="Place">At Oregon Caves</fex>, a stream <t>runs</t> through the dining room.</ex></def-root>
